verses.roman:
eta kahi' prabhu tāṅra garva cūrṇa kariyā
tāṅre sukha dite kahe siddhānta phirāiyā

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅra—his (of Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa); garva—pride; cūrṇa kariyā—smashing into pieces; tāṅre—unto him; sukha dite—to give happiness; kahe—says; siddhānta phirāiyā—turning the whole conversation.
translation: In this way Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu deflated the pride of Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa, but just to make him happy again, He spoke as follows.
